faqs.q: How long does the visa process take?
faqs.a: Processing times vary by visa type and destination country. Tourist visas typically take 7-15 days, while work and student visas can take 30-90 days. We provide realistic timelines during consultation.
We maintain a 99% success rate for properly documented applications. Our expert team ensures all requirements are met before submission.

faqs.q: Do you provide services for all countries?
faqs.a: We specialize in major destinations including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, Germany, and many others. Contact us to confirm availability for your specific destination.

faqs.q: What documents do I need to start?
faqs.a: Basic requirements include passport, photographs, financial documents, and purpose-specific documents. We provide a detailed checklist during consultation.
Yes, our initial 30-minute consultation is completely free. This helps us understand your needs and provide accurate guidance.

faqs.q: Do you help with post-approval support?
faqs.a: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive support including travel planning, accommodation assistance, and settlement guidance.

faqs.q: What if my visa gets rejected?
faqs.a: We offer free reapplication support for rejected cases. Our team analyzes the rejection reasons and helps strengthen your application.

faqs.q: Can I track my application status?
faqs.a: Yes, we provide regular updates on your application status and are available for any questions throughout the process.
